Posts.Content: i was in hospital last week so i understand as well talk to your bn about your fears she will help aroma mum do you get daily injections now since the blood clot i have to do them every day till 6 weeks after my last cemo xxxx
Posts.Title: Just spent 6 days in hospital

Posts.Content: hi to everyone hope you all have a wonderful christmas and thank you to you all without you the last month would have been alot worse for me im feeling lucky today that my cemo has allowed me to have a better few days to enjoy christmas with my family and i wish this for you all xxxxx
Posts.Title: christmas

Posts.Content: hi jill im so sorry this has happened to you and really hope your results go well i start cemo on the 3ed of dec i know its scary just now the waiting is the worse i wouldent have got through the last few weeks without the kindness of people on here good luck x
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed.

Posts.Content: well done im glad its over for you ive got 2 cemos left then ill get mine done and the fact you can post on here makes me worry less hope you can sleep well tonight xx
Posts.Title: had my mastectomy today

Posts.Content: hi binny i dont know much about the pill your on but some people have said simalier things that you have the body scan could just be away of ruling out anything else  i really wish you luck and send you huge hugs     marg xxxx
Posts.Title: Need some help here girls....

Posts.Content: hi alfieval i had the same as you but a double masc. i found the pain after alot better than i thought it was going to be i think like you i worried so much before but was pleased that my fears were not founded alot of ladys that i spoke to also said the same dont worry you will be fine xxxxx
Posts.Title: Really scared

Posts.Content: hi i think alfie deserves a huge treat well done alfie xx
Posts.Title: Really scared

Posts.Content: hi joanne i am sorry that you find yourself on here you will be scared and have alot of feelings just now  you will have alot of support on here what op are you having and you will feel better when treatment starts i was told this and thought no way but i did xxxx
Posts.Title: Really scared

Posts.Content: hi my cat is called jake and after op only thing that worried me when i lay down in bed was jake jumping on me lol and she tried alot xx
Posts.Title: Really scared

Posts.Content: hi it will get better i know it might not feel like that just now you are near the end of cemo and have done really well if you want to stay in bed do it i watched mrs browns boys on bad days it helped  xxxx
Posts.Title: Can't stop crying

Posts.Content: i think this is a brill plan our oncolgy unit at livingston is very small and its easy to meet people and it  helps alot xx
Posts.Title: Could I suggest buddy system? You could have a bosom buddy too :-...

Posts.Content: well my big day tomorrow cant believe its come so fast does anyone have any tips how to cope with a double masc. please  i have become really nervous thanks xx
Posts.Title: op day tomorrow

Posts.Content: thank you everyone i spent today with my youngest daughter shopping then dropped her of at my  other daughters house home now and ready for tomorrow xx
Posts.Title: op day tomorrow

Posts.Content: hi kat first can i say lumps are not always cancer get them looked at as fast as you can then you will know whats going on im not going to say dont worry ive been their and i know it will be on your mind all the time but dont worry alone come on here the lovely ladies on here will be their for you all the way i hope its not cancer but if it is you will not be alone and you  as you say are ready for the fight good luck let us know how you get on big hugs xx
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: well done for going to your gp  good luck with your hospital appointment and as everyone saying on here enjoy your new year xx
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: hi you are very lucky to have a fast service i live in edinburgh and they are fast and very good i know that im also lucky try and just think of new year i know you will find it hard to but you are in good hands now x
Posts.Title: nervous for my tests on Tuesday. trying too keep busy

Posts.Content: thank you everyone i will let you all know as soon as i can how i get on xxxx
Posts.Title: op day tomorrow

Posts.Content: hi thanks op went well  x home but so glad to be home xx
Posts.Title: op day tomorrow

Posts.Content: you will get better it takes time i am 2 weeks post op and understand how you feel i had a good day friday and yesterday and felt like me again today im looking around my house and wishing i could find the energy to do more housework than just tidying and wee hoover your body has had a shock and needs rest and choc xxxx
Posts.Title: When will I be "ME" again ???

Posts.Content: i think it was  really good all my daughters done it even my 14yearold who wont put the bin out without makeup lol like her mum xx
Posts.Title: Selfies and donations

Posts.Content: this is fantastic i laughed and shed a tear at the same time you got the whole treatment down to a tee well done xx
Posts.Title: I Wish I'd Felt Both Of Me Tits - (adapted from Pam Ayers)

Posts.Content: hi busymom like you im feeling bit unusual today as well like a bad flu no sickness as well im glad about that i just keep telling myself my body is trying to get  rid of the enemy inside and i have to support it hope you have a good day hugs xx
Posts.Title: 2 days into chemo.........

Posts.Content: have it looked at dont ignore it my cancer was only found in my other breast because i decided on a double masc. i means i needed more cemo but i feel i got very lucky good luck xx
Posts.Title: Bloody cancer!

Posts.Content: hi ive been home for 2 hours since having  my first cemo i have small headache and bad taste in mouth but i dont know why but i cant sit down ive cleaned the whole house and feel like im looking for things to do if i cant find something im crying i dont know if this is normal
Posts.Title: cemo

Posts.Content: thank you for your replys i do think its the steriods thats causing this and if you were my neighbour i would have done your house today lol i hope i sleep tonight but will take ipad with me to bed just to be on the safe side take care and hope you both are well xx
Posts.Title: cemo

Posts.Content: thank you canton04 hope you itchyness goes soon and well done in getting through cemo i like the daily mirror tip as well will be doing that xx
Posts.Title: cemo

Posts.Content: hi santapolajane it is very scary  likeyou i also shut down good luck when cemo starts post on here if your worried scared or just need to vent im glad i do have met some wonderful people to chat to big hugs xxxxx
Posts.Title: cemo

Posts.Content: wow alllison you look brillant  its good to see theirs is nice things to look forward to xxxx
Posts.Title: Look Good Feeling Better

Posts.Content: hi i feel so sick on fec cemo  i am so fed up with treatment now i just want to stop now i have had enough
Posts.Title: fec

Posts.Content: hi gillieB thank you for your reply my doctor is really good and kind and i will ask for them yes grandchildren are very important in this i agree its so cute that your granddaughter thinks she helped your hair grow back xxxx
Posts.Title: fec

Posts.Content: hi thanks for your replys i have 2 to go and my doc gave me some new pills this afternoon so i hope they help my granddaughter gave me a huge hug today and told me she loved me and shes only 17 months gave me the shake i needed i dont think she will ever know how much her being in my world is what sees me through the bad times xxxx
Posts.Title: fec

Posts.Content: binny im so sorry you are going through this worry again good luck i hope its ok xxxxx
Posts.Title: Need more help girls....

Posts.Content: hi GNJ no it wasent emend but i do feel wee bit better tonight and very hungry but  scared to eat lol i havent slept much but have kept my self awake all day so i hope tonight will be better thank you xx
Posts.Title: fec

Posts.Content: hi thismight seem really silly i am on day 6 after fec cemo but wow i am hungry all the time have been for 2 days nothing fills me and today because my daughter said i will go to the shop in a hour for your sweets i took a huff lol much to my daughters amusement when will this pass i have even done a huge tesco shop for early tomorrow morning filled with goodies xx
Posts.Title: food

Posts.Content: lol thanks thank god this is not a web cam chat lol i dont think its a pretty sight me drooling over that list lol xx
Posts.Title: food

Posts.Content: hi i think its really normal how you feel i have had cemo and dpuble masc and still have some cemo and radiotherapy to go i have a sister who rolls her eyes when i talk to her about my cancer please dont feel you are alone everyone here will help as much as they can if you want to stay in bed today just do that you deserve it you have been through alot  i have seen on here so many times other ladys saying that people thought they should be back to normal but i think normal for us as we knew it will never come back just a knew normal take care and do what your body tells you xxxx
Posts.Title: help feel awful at 2 radiotherapy to go

Posts.Content: hi kim im getting double masc after cemo but that was only because i am very large in the boob department   not all doctors agree to this i was very lucky i understand why you want it done but i think theirs never a sure way that would work theirs a lovely girl on here allison who has the same bc as yourself who will reply to your post im in my 40s as well and understand how you will be feeling good luck with the rest of your treatment    xxxx
Posts.Title: Should I go for a double mascectomy?

Posts.Content: i know its just feb but after cemo my op will prob be at start of april or near that but a thought come to me tonight when looking at my garden how long after double mas. will i be able to cut my grass and do the things i love doing in my garden in the spring and summer thanks xx
Posts.Title: op

Posts.Content: hi i am sorry you feel so alone it is a horrible feeling  its has only been a few weeks give your self  time you have had a huge shock i promise you will have better days we are all here for you anytime you need a good scream add me as a pal if you want and we can talk some more sleep is not something i am good at so even through the night someone can be their for you xxxxx
Posts.Title: feel alone

Posts.Content: thank you for your replys my 2 oldest nephews were here when i was reading your replys and they have said they will keep it looking nice for me this summer im going to order that bench now i really hope spring and summer is a good one xx
Posts.Title: op

Posts.Content: hi kateG  i will send  them with first class post lol xx
Posts.Title: op

Posts.Content: hi and welcome have you been told your treatment plan yet i know how you will be feeling just now but once your treatment starts you will feel more in control i had cemo double mas. and i start a couple of more cemo next wed. what ever you have to do their is people on here that will help you every step of the way you are not alone xxxx
Posts.Title: first day

Posts.Content: hi jude i dont know if this will help much but if you are on facebook their is a page called eek my mum has breast cancer i found it on friday night as my daughter has been suffering since i told her i had bc talk to your mum dont be afraid to be honest with her you will  find shes worrying about you just as much as you her i told my daughter yesterday im her mum first and bc sufferer second and that will never change good luck x
Posts.Title: Just been told by mum she has breast cancer

Posts.Content: i had a double masc 9 weeks ago and since i have started wearing my bra with softies i havent had to be drained and i do feel alot more cosy with it on xx
Posts.Title: Seroma problems

Posts.Content: call your cemo unit they will give you a mouth wash to help this is the part of tax i dident like my mouth was vile pineapple juice used to help me a little and helped with tasting food xxxx
Posts.Title: help please

Posts.Content: hi yasmin i know that feeling well. well done in finishing your cemo  i know theirs days when you feel like you will never feel well again but it will come and  hopfully not to long for you remember your body has had to work very hard to deal with your cemo  rest and if you can give yourself a hug treat  you deserve it  sending you hug hugs  xxxx
Posts.Title: Breast cancer triple neg grad 3

Posts.Content: hi and well done for being halfway through i really think your emotions are very normal as i havent cried as much as i do just now cemo floors me as well speak to your breast nurse they will help i find watching things like miranda and mrs browns boys help me and when i dont feel so sick choc and loads of it this will pass you have done well to get this far im doing the race for life in edinburgh in the summer that has helped me focus on something else and given me something to look forwaed to hang on in their you can do this xxxx
Posts.Title: Not tolerating chemo

Posts.Content: hi  jacquie glad your feeling bit better i would love to have a glass of wine as well but hopfully like me by the weekend it will like you again xxxxx
Posts.Title: Not tolerating chemo

Posts.Content: every hospital is different with how fast they go with this i was really quick i went to my gp on the monday them mammogram on the wednesday the first app on the thursday biopsys done then the following monday scans then week after that treatment started if you feel they taken to long contact your breast nurse who can hurry things up for you i wouldent have liked the wait you are having its alot of worry and stress xx
Posts.Title: Friday the 13th is upon me - feeling lonely

Posts.Content: hi lucy i am so sorry you find yourself here this is the worst part for you the scans the waiting for results once treatment starts it does start to feel better their are loads of lovely girls on here who will help through the tough times i know i could have not got through the last 6 months without them i am 3 weeks post double masc. and it was no were near as bad as i thought i wish you luck for friday and we are here even if its for a good old moan sending you hugs xxxx
Posts.Title: 30 AND JUST DIAGNOSED WITH BREAST CANCER

Posts.Content: hi the same happened to me dont worry about i put sudcream on mine and it helped                                                                                  marg xx
Posts.Title: Blotchy face following third T

Posts.Content: hi i had my first cemo last thursday for the last four days i have slept and felt like i cant do this today i woke up feeling much better still tired but hungry and doing little things around the house i have not slept all day and moaning at my 14 yearold about her bedroom it is  rough you will have bad days but like i found you also have good days but their is a pill to help with every sideaffect  i will know better next time my next one is also on the 2nd good luck
Posts.Title: starting treatment

Posts.Content: angie im going to have my hair shaved tomorrow i have a wig with no greys lol so looking forward to it  and my daufgter bought me a santa hat with long hair as well so im fixed for christmas hope you both have good christmas  xx
Posts.Title: starting treatment

Posts.Content: hi my last cemo was delayed because of a cold  but i took sudafed for it and it did help its only friday so hopefully should be away before your cemo is due i know its your last one and you dont want a delay but to give you cemo while ill would make you very ill the delay would be worth it good luck xxxx
Posts.Title: Cold medication

Posts.Content: i had a double masc. on friday and i am already getting annoyed at not being cosy at night i love walking about more comfy but cant be doing that all night xx
Posts.Title: Getting better but can't sleep at night

Posts.Content: hi im glad to be home bit stiff today  but fine moving arms ok but wow you should have seen the male nurse that was with me when i woke up yummy or what xx
Posts.Title: Getting better but can't sleep at night

Posts.Content: thanks geera97 glad you had a good night sleep im going to be sitting in my garden today on my new bench that a lovely lady on here suggested good advice xxxx
Posts.Title: Getting better but can't sleep at night

Posts.Content: hi binny you so right with everything you have said im staying in tonight and watching tv with my youngest daughter with duvet wrapped round me with treats i do feel better for quiet day i hope you do as well x
Posts.Title: Flight or Fight.

Posts.Content: today after leaving hospital after pre cemo chat and finding out its been delayed for 5 days because i have a infection i dont why but i come home and cried for hours and phoned them to tell them i dont want treatment they were really nice and said they will call me tomorrow until now i have been very positive is this normal
Posts.Title: hospital

Posts.Content: hi tracy phone your gp and ask for a urgent appointment you need support today write down how you feel and if you get stuck trying to talk to your gp show him what you wrote down . you cant deal with this on your own anymore its making you ill i work with ladys who are in alot of distress if you want you can add me as a freind and i will chat with you anytime you want but today see your gp dont put it off xxxx
Posts.Title: im so tired can someone help me please.

Posts.Content: hi im have my cemo at st johns livingston its a shame you wont be finished before xmas but new year new start i had my hair cut short  today ready for cemo then found out tonights to be the coldest night of the year lol thanks for yesterday xx
Posts.Title: hospital

Posts.Content: i really wish you well i hope the  letrozole is working for you yes its time for you to party and have a good hoilday good luck x
Posts.Title: hospital

Posts.Content: alison yes you were right in what you said im in a better place this morning back to being positive  thank you x
Posts.Title: hospital

Posts.Content: im glad you also feel better today and have a drink for me at your party you deserve to let your hair down and have the time of your life my brother in law is 50 in august so my plan is to be ready to party then good luck to you and your final steps to freedom x
Posts.Title: hospital

Posts.Content: thank you for your reply i know you are right i have seen in a different post that your really down just now its totally understandable after what you have been through speak to your doctor and see if they can help you through this low point xx
Posts.Title: hospital

Posts.Content: hi linds i had a pain in my breast and i thought it must be advanced cancer but it was early cancer every womans body is different some have pain some dont and it is easy for people to say dont worry when its all you can think about but please dont  use google it can make it worse but always come on here theirs always someone to help and who never get bored trying to help good luck                                                                                                                                                                  marg xx
Posts.Title: Breast thickening and further tests

Posts.Content: hi well done i know how you are feeling as i finished my last cemo this week its a great feeling xx
Posts.Title: last chemo!!!!!

Posts.Content: hi their i cant promise you it wont happen again but your team will do all they can to prevent it i know you must be really scared just now you can ask them to reduce the dose they give you it will help a little with sideeffects you have done so well and you should be proud of your self doing 4 cemos already well done come on you can do the last 2 we are all here to support you good luck xxxx
Posts.Title: dosetaxel

Posts.Content: hi yvonne dont be sorry you have been through a rough time ive moaned on here loads of times nobody will judge you thats why its a safe place to vent and im glad i come on here without it i think i would have went mad take care xxxx
Posts.Title: I must say sorry

Posts.Content: i think at some point we all hoped for the words its been a huge mistake i know i did xxxx
Posts.Title: Hope???

Posts.Content: hi thank you for the replys i bought eye drops this morning so i hope this helps and louise i also booked a eye test for tomorrow so i can have it done before my op next friday thanks again xxxx
Posts.Title: lashes

Posts.Content: hi can anyone suggest something to help till i can phone hospital tomorrow i have painfull peeling hands and feet were my cemo gave me burns ive tried e45 but not helping i know it sounds daft but ive put of my shower today because of it but really want to go and have one thanks xx
Posts.Title: sore hands and feet

Posts.Content: thank you my daughter is off to shops for me right now to get cream yes im getting rads so will be good to have thank you so much for advice xx
Posts.Title: sore hands and feet

Posts.Content: hi gillieB your advice yesterday made for a very comfortable night thank you and when the nurse saw them at surgery today she said i was doing the right thing with them so big thank you xxxx
Posts.Title: sore hands and feet

Posts.Content: thank you and yes its time to party xxxx
Posts.Title: sore hands and feet

Posts.Content: hi marie thanks for your advice good luck with your 1st t ive finished so if you need advice just shout yes put dark nail polish on your nails before you start the t and that should help xxxx
Posts.Title: lashes

Posts.Content: when i first saw this i thought about the wrong year because i did that but thought no only myself does that lol so glad to hear its not xx
Posts.Title: Hope???

Posts.Content: hi they said because i had it last time i should have been given creams to stop it this time its my fault i should have said something to them but i dident but its my last one so it can only get better xxxx
Posts.Title: sore hands and feet

Posts.Content: hi im 4 weeks post cemo i dident lose my eyebrows or lashes but over the last couple of days the cold wind here in edinburgh is making my eyes sore and runny they itch as well but dont understand as still have my lashes could they have thinned and i cant notice it thanks
Posts.Title: lashes

Posts.Content: hi is anybody on here with bt mail i am having alot of trouble clicking on to the macmillian links through my emails x
Posts.Title: emails

Posts.Content: hi i used to be able to click on the link from my emails and it would take me straight to the chat but now i have to do what you do x
Posts.Title: emails

Posts.Content: thank you for your help yes i will try that later its my stubborn nature i wont give in till i get it the way i want it lol  once again thank you xxxx
Posts.Title: emails

Posts.Content: thank you for your replys  i changed to apple last week i think thats what has happened weird isnt it lol
Posts.Title: emails

Posts.Content: hi just to say when the girls on here say to watch yourself with the sun while on cemo please listen i sat out in the sun this morning fell asleep when i woke up i have severe burns i was given fluids at the hospital and i am home still very sore but have meds home to help with the pain and burns and told if i stayed out in the sun for longer i would have spent a few days in hospital xx
Posts.Title: sunburn

Posts.Content: hi how long after cemo do you  have to be careful for not that their ever much sun in edinburgh lol xx
Posts.Title: SUNSHINE!

Posts.Content: my breastnurse today told me she was going to order me something today to help with the menopause hot flushes and she said i wear it inside my knickers has anyone heard of this or used it and has it been any good thanks xx
Posts.Title: menopause

Posts.Content: morning lu i did not have to pay for it and so far all i have is positive feed back about it  i cant wait to find out if it works lol i will try  anything xx
Posts.Title: menopause

Posts.Content: hi thanks for the replys i went out and got the daily mail after reading your reply i will get it next wed i am looking forward to it now and i will let you all know how i get on thank you xxxx
Posts.Title: menopause

Posts.Content: hi kat just to say im thinking of you this is the worst bit  for you sending you hugs xxxx
Posts.Title: hospital called doctor wants to see me. scared

Posts.Content: hi kiera  i  so sorry you feel this way i think to have been through what you have been through makes you a brave wonderful girl i dont think their will be one person in this group that has never felt the way you do now i know i did when i lost my hair at the start  talk to your gp or breast nurse im sure they will be able to help i lost my partner at the start of my treatment he walked out and said he dident want to be with a freak at the start i blamed my self and dident blame him like you but now im glad hes gone i dont need him in my life im much better without him you are worth much more than this and never blame yourself because someone else is weak  take care big hugs                                                                                                                                                                                                marg xx
Posts.Title: I can't cope anymore

Posts.Content: hi thamks allison for what you said but i know that without the support of all you wonderfull ladies on here i would not be so positive xx
Posts.Title: I can't cope anymore

Posts.Content: hi john i agree with alison and you sound like a lovely man thank you                                                                                                                                                                                             marg
Posts.Title: I can't cope anymore

Posts.Content: hi gillieB happy new year to you and all the best for 2014 i think the wigs and scarves wont be used for long but i dont mind a hat i have been lucky i have eyebrows and lashes that seem to be looking better than ever  so topless will be something ill be doing soon but yesterday i thought bongo meant topless no bra no top lol just shows how hungover i was lol
Posts.Title: new year

Posts.Content: happy new year everyone today i have a headache for once it nots cemo causing it before my next lot on friday i went out last night had a good night  had fun laughed and forgot what i had just for one night i woke up to a text you left your wig here and i laughed as i remembered showing my head off for one night i was me again and loved it
Posts.Title: new year

Posts.Content: hi alison happy new year topless sounds good maybay next year xx
Posts.Title: new year

Posts.Content: good luck tomorrow hope all goes well i agree to wear a wig all my life would be the worst thing i feel for your pal as well take care marg xx
Posts.Title: new year

Posts.Content: i still have no hair still have 3 cemos to go i really hope i can go topless soon i stay in edinburgh thanks alison you made my start to 2014 funny xx
Posts.Title: new year

Posts.Content: well tonights the night of my end of booby party im looking forward to it but really nervous as ill see some people for the first time since cemo should i wear my hat or go topless i dont know what to do xxx
Posts.Title: party

Posts.Content: thank you for all your replys i had a brillant night very hungover today but woke up to loads of bras lying  all over my house lol and we raised 83 pound selling 2 of my pals husbands as slaves for the night and i will give the money to my breast nurse xx
Posts.Title: party

Posts.Content: morning alison  i cant look at toast never mind full english lol
Posts.Title: party

Posts.Content: hi our breast cancer nurses have a cottage in oban that we all use for week breaks and its free so your one might have access to something as well hope this helps xxxxx
Posts.Title: Zoladex and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: hi alison my dentist told me it was because of infection and it can make you really ill they need your immune system to be 100 percent to stop this happening i got all my work done 3 weeks before cemo                                                                   marg xx
Posts.Title: Dentist

Posts.Content: hi i have to agree with paul i started with a partner when i found out i had cancer i dont know he was horrid to me when i told him i still have very down times but i like to enjoy life new year was the best one ever i even had a end of booby party before my double masc.i dont look for people to make me happy i do that myself and found some true pals on my way and now at the very early stages of a new guy in my life but as a pal just now but who knows take care xxxx
Posts.Title: Zoladex and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: all this week i have had a busy but good time i managed to cook chistmas dinner and do everything i normally do at this time of year and yesterday was my granddaughters first birthday and her party went really well tonight is my brother in laws 40th party and i said to my sister i dont think ill be going as i think my body saying come on your in the middle of cemo i need rest as i have no energy this morning  but  she has put me on a guilt trip so i will have to go any tips on how to get over this tired feeling today please thanks
Posts.Title: tired

Posts.Content: phone them and ask if they have one good luck xx
Posts.Title: Zoladex and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: hi thanks for your replys you are both right i have had very quiet day today and i am not going tonight im having quiet night watching tv with my youngest daughter and having little treats and takaway amd i am enjoying doing nothing xx
Posts.Title: tired

Posts.Content: thanks dorothee  today im enjoying having a energy day and doing housework and wrapping presents taking me longer than normal but loving it still nearly done then christmas movies with my daughter who is making sandwiches and hot drinks as i type this xx
Posts.Title: periods after cemo

Posts.Content: hi trudi i will ask the next time im at hosptial i also shaved my hair but i love my wig lol i have no grey hairs i am 48 i know night sweats are due to cemo i was warned of that good luck to you as well and have a good christmas xx
Posts.Title: periods after cemo

Posts.Content: hi kate thanks for your reply and it did help only time will tell if mine goes thank you and hope you are well xx
Posts.Title: periods after cemo

Posts.Content: hi thanks for your replys my daughter and myself are watching mrs browns boys box sets and laughing ourselfs mad and emma you are right about catching something nasty as well im glad i stayed in xx
Posts.Title: tired

Posts.Content: hi i keep looking as well i hope he ok and having a celebratory drink xx
Posts.Title: thank yuo to evertone

Posts.Content: hi could some one tell me how long after cemo does your period stop i had first cemo 9 days ago i an due this weekend will that one be stopped thank you
Posts.Title: periods after cemo

Posts.Content: hi dorothee thanks for your reply im not bothered if they dont come back i was hoping they would stop its just that ive been very weepy yesterday and today and thought this one might come like you i wont miss them hope you are well and looking forward to a lovely christmas xx
Posts.Title: periods after cemo

Posts.Content: 14 days post op
Posts.Title: 4 days post op

Posts.Content: thank you and good luck for tomorrow x
Posts.Title: bone scan

Posts.Content: hi yes i am i just got mine done this morning going back for scan at 2
Posts.Title: bone scan

Posts.Content: hi good luck today hope it goes well i sent you a message last night xx
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo Today

Posts.Content: have just come home and have to wait till 2 for bone scan i had a injection to show my bones better but dont know what the scan will be like
Posts.Title: bone scan

Posts.Content: hi aroma mum just to say just back from scan  i feel asleep think my snoring got on his nerve lol but they like you to empty your bladder before scan so just nip into the toilet before good luck
Posts.Title: bone scan

Posts.Content: yes lol i might be 48 but ive got living to do xx
Posts.Title: 4 days post op

Posts.Content: hi i went for a dd  tomorrow my granddaughter is coming for visit looking forward to see her xx
Posts.Title: 4 days post op

Posts.Content: today i decided to go out shopping as my mood has been low since op armed with false boobs and wig and makeup i had a good time i also went for bar lunch im so tired tonight but feel better and i got chatted up from a nice looking man thank you so much for the support through my low time xxxx
Posts.Title: 4 days post op

Posts.Content: hi binny just to say im thinking of you and good luck sending you huge hugs  marg xxxx
Posts.Title: Bone Scan.

Posts.Content: aww binny im so pleased for you i was thinking of you all night have more than one cider you deserve it  huge hugs marg xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Bone Scan.

Posts.Content: hi binny just to say im thinking of you and good luck sending you huge hugs  marg xxxx
Posts.Title: Bone Scan.

Posts.Content: aww binny im so pleased for you i was thinking of you all night have more than one cider you deserve it  huge hugs marg xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Bone Scan.

Posts.Content: hi i remember my first and feeling like . by tuesday or wed you should start feeling them going away and feeling a bit more better i had my last one a week and a half ago and dident feel to bad on that one just do what your body tells you  dont try and push it till its ready you will be ok a nice warm bath helps the pain take care im here anytime to want to talk xxxx
Posts.Title: Docetaxel - please tell me it gets better??

Posts.Content: hi i am just at the start of treatment so i dont know for sure you could be suffering  from stress you have been through alot on your own and the death of your dog cant be helping but i would go to your gp and tell her about your headaches just to get them looked at and she could offer you something to help with the pain hope you feel better soon x
Posts.Title: Headaches is this normal

Posts.Content: hi i hurt my foot its not bad but  if walking long it does hurt i bought a heat rub to help but it really burned it and now its got blisters doctor told me not to use it till 6 months after cemo i dident know this and was never told has anyone else did this xx
Posts.Title: heat rub

Posts.Content: i was a big cup as well my hospital gave me 3 post op bras ask you breast nurse about it xx
Posts.Title: Post Op Bra Size 32G!

Posts.Content: i know i might sound like a moan i am 6 days post double masc. i really want a bath and a good sleep and not to be crying all day and were my drain is its hurting i have hospital tomorrow and dreading going out sorry for moaning xxxx
Posts.Title: fed up

Posts.Content: good luck with your op xx
Posts.Title: Post Op Bra Size 32G!

Posts.Content: hi thanks for all your king words mashley only thing i can say about your drains is be careful with them i have had 2 taken out but have pulled the one i have in twice and needed  it fixed good luck xx
Posts.Title: fed up

Posts.Content: hi good luck with your results i am not going to lie to you cemo is tough but  not everyone reacts the same i had fec cemo 10 days ago last weekend i thought no i cant do this and this weekend i am doing a big clean in my house i do get more tired but sideeffects dont last long but what ever happens to you we will support you all the way think of cemo as a friend its their to help you take care xxxx
Posts.Title: so my nightmare begins

Posts.Content: well done katherine you can do this it will get better i was were you are today last weekend if you need a good moan just come on here and i will hear you big hugs xx
Posts.Title: so my nightmare begins

Posts.Content: hi emma i am so sorry about your news but agree with ethel theirs a lady i talk to at my hospital who got mets in her hip that was 13years ago and she is going strong 70 yearold and you should see her trying to pull the male nurses lol
Posts.Title: It's Back! And this time it's...

Posts.Content: when i was on hoilday last week i think was in just a good happy place in my mind . but since coming home on sat. i have had horrlble feelings that i dont want to live in this house anymore and that i dont want to be the person that cancer has turned me into  i am even looking at pals and thinking do i need them in my life i dont know why this is happening xx
Posts.Title: moods

Posts.Content: hi thanks for your replys i think holiday blues is whats wrong and when i was away nobody knew me and i felt like a normal girl and i was not the girl with cancer thanks again xx
Posts.Title: moods

Posts.Content: hi yes its already done i am going to new jersey at the end of the year to visit a pal this holiday has been in the planning for a couple of years xx
Posts.Title: moods

Posts.Content: hi you should find in the next few days you will start to feel better and you will go through a better time before your next one im not going to lie to you but i felt like that with all my cemos but dident feel as bad with the rest because i knew it dident last long if your worried about anything talk to your cemo nurse she will help you good luck xxxx
Posts.Title: after effects chemo

Posts.Content: well done you lossing your hair is hard  i remember when i lost mine my granddaughter was a bit weird with me but now she loves my slap head and she is only 17 months if i wear a wig she comes and takes it off lol she likes stroking my head to go to sleep when shes here xx
Posts.Title: Hair worries

Posts.Content: i had a full mx and cant imagine how i thought they would just do a scan xx
Posts.Title: Mammogram after mx?

Posts.Content: hi i was told since i had a full masc. i would never need a mammogram again i just cant see how its possible xx
Posts.Title: Mammogram after mx?

Posts.Content: hi yvonne to anybody on here what you say makes perfect sense i think we have had all the thoughts you did in the early days im glad your medical team is good to you mine is as well when you start treatment you will feel more in control again have a cry when ever you want it will help you and come on here theirs always someone willing to help you are not alone take care sending you huge hugs xxxxx
Posts.Title: It's starting to seem real ?

Posts.Content: that wig look brillant it looks real well done            marg xx
Posts.Title: Wig Photo (attempt)

Posts.Content: hi julie i am a single parent and i get no help at all and i know a few single mums who are the same i worked most of the time through cemo but i am of now that i had my op but will be going back as soon as i feel even a little bit better xx
Posts.Title: No financial help!!

Posts.Content: hi julie i am a single parent and i get no help at all and i know a few single mums who are the same i worked most of the time through cemo but i am of now that i had my op but will be going back as soon as i feel even a little bit better xx
Posts.Title: No financial help!!

Posts.Content: i have to give my self blood thinning injections every day while on cemo the first one is the hardest but you will get used to them i put mine in my leg its hard to think i had a needle fear before this lol dont think it about it and you will be fine                   good luck xxxx marg xx
Posts.Title: Self injections for 7 days

Posts.Content: im so pleased for you emma this week is my second last one i cant wait till 3 weeks on wed to be in the same place as you xxxx
Posts.Title: Last chemo tomorrow!

Posts.Content: hi being tired is the thing that gets to me i am 3 weeks post double masc. and thought i would have more energy by now but i just go with what my body wants now and rest if it wants to xx
Posts.Title: Tired

Posts.Content: hi lindy it does seem like a long haul i have one treatment left then i am on tamoxifen if i was to be honest with my self i think i am getting scared at becoming so close to 6monthly appointments as well i hope you are well today if you ever need to talk i am here and add me as a freind if you want take care xxxx
Posts.Title: treatment overload

Posts.Content: thank you to you both yes new year lol that was a good one cant believe it was 7 months ago already xx
Posts.Title: treatment overload

Posts.Content: woke up this morning phoned my breast nurse and said i cant do this anymore i am fed up with being touched poked at feeling sick and that i was starting to fear needles and she was so nice and understanding and made me a appointment to see my doctor at the hospital for wednesday she thought i could just come to talk no touching or needles i thought how lucky i was to have such good understanding xx
Posts.Title: treatment overload

Posts.Content: hi this sounds really awfull for you im just at the start of my journey but know how alone i feel even through i have loads of support and cant imagine how you feel you need to start thinking of yourself my bf dumped me as soon as i told him of my cancer please dont think you are alone you have been through the bravest battle of your life xx
Posts.Title: Alone after treatment with no one

Posts.Content: i really thought it was good i had a little laugh when the woman showed their boobs as when i first went to hospital it took ages for the doctor and breast nurse to tempt me to strip off  and now i am so used to it the doctor laughed the last time i saw her because i just took off all my top half and i dident have to that day lol how i have changed xx
Posts.Title: beating breast cancer

Posts.Content: yes we  both can and we will be stronger for it come into the chat room tonight they are nice people x
Posts.Title: Alone after treatment with no one

Posts.Content: just to let everyone know tonight on stv or itv down south their is a tonight special about breast cancer i think it would be worth a watch xx its at 7.30 xx
Posts.Title: beating breast cancer

Posts.Content: hi just wanted to let you know i am thinking of you just now and yes stay of google it makes it worse xxxx
Posts.Title: Another Biopsy really scared

Posts.Content: thank you i am having my morning coffee and reading it now xx
Posts.Title: i fell apart

Posts.Content: hi thamks hotflushes are something i am getting used to now i can cope with them i can cope with anything that helps me be around for my daughters and granddaughter for a long time to come xx
Posts.Title: hormone treatment

Posts.Content: today after a chat with breastnurse it has left me a bit confused she said that im in the middle when it comes to hormone treatment and it might not be worth it to start them to suffer sideeffects for nothing but its up to me im feeling bit scared as will it not come back without them xxxx
Posts.Title: hormone treatment

Posts.Content: hi ive been thinking about  it all day and decided that i will take it as anything is better than nothing to me thank you xx
Posts.Title: hormone treatment

Posts.Content: 2 weeks ago out the blue i started to fall apart all the stress of the last year came out at the same time i was very depressed  i dident notice it was happening to me i thought i was tough i have accepeted help now its going to take time but i will get through this i have taken a month of work to relax and have time to recover anyone starting out on treatment please dont push yourself to hard talk to anyone who you can dont bottle it up and try to be tough and look after yourself xxxx
Posts.Title: i fell apart

Posts.Content: thank you shaz i will phone my bn in morning if ok to take i will start it  thanks again xx
Posts.Title: hormone treatment

Posts.Content: laughter is the best meds you can get i swear by it all the time xx
Posts.Title: Don't forget to laugh

Posts.Content: i know how upset you must feel this has happened to me before but it is for your own good your body needs to rest before you get your next one it sound like your team are looking after you well it wont be long till you get it  big hugs xxxxx
Posts.Title: Chemo delayed

Posts.Content: hi this is the same one as i am on i always feel well till day 3 then i feel very flu like and tired  i dident feel sick with the first 2 but wished i had taken advice about taken the anti sickness tablets any way as was really sick with this one but by day 8 with them all i have felt alot better and have went out and about i lost alot of hair with the first on a shaved the rest off but since then its growing back slowly  i still have 2 to go one on wed then my last one in 3 weeks good luck just remember to take anti sickness even if you dont feel sick xxxx
Posts.Title: starting chemo - tips and advice please?

Posts.Content: hi ive have saw lots of posts about nails but havent had any problems with them yet when does it start and can i do anything to stop it xxxx
Posts.Title: starting chemo - tips and advice please?
